name: Anaerobic
description:
Anaerobic is a 2D causal action game. In Anaerobic, players will act as a microbe which will find themselves in the boiling water so the dangerous bubbles from the bottom must be avoided. The water level keeps decreasing but players can pick up items that appear to regain water.

The purpose of this game is to get as much higher score as players can, the score is related to the time players survived. Four different characters with special abilities could be chosen.

Please use full screen to play.
